title: Nicole Kidman & Keith Urban End 19-Year Marriage – Full Breakup Details
shortdescription: One of Hollywood's longest-lasting couples calls it quits in shocking 2025 split.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: After 19 years of marriage and two daughters together, Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban have decided to separate. Sources confirm the split is amicable but final — they’ve already begun dividing assets and working out custody.
The couple was last seen together publicly at the 2025 Oscars, where many noticed they arrived separately and barely interacted.

Insiders cite years of living apart (Nicole filming globally while Keith tours), plus growing tension over his alleged late-night partying during his 2025 residency in Las Vegas. Friends say Nicole finally reached her breaking point.
